Straight Shot wasn't sure herself about Waspinator but she knew she had to =
give it a try.

" Don't worry guys, I'm sure Waspinator will help us if I a=
sk him and tell him why we need the device.  When we worked together, I saw=
 a part of him that I never thought I would see in a Predacon .  I can't ex=
plain what it is because even I'm not so sure about it but it's definitely =
not something bad."

She looks to Leo thoughtfully.

" I know that the Pred=
acons are our natural enemies but, maybe some of them are just misunderstoo=
d.  I think Waspinator is one of those who are even misunderstood by their =
own comrades.  I never thought I would actually be speaking up for a Predac=
on but, this time it's different.  Anyway, I better get going and see if I =
can contact Waspinator."

She salutes as she saunters off to contact what c=
ould be her newest friend.

" Waspinator, it's me, Straight Shot.  I need y=
our help and I was wondering if you could meet me half way between the Ark =
and where you're stationed.  Also, I was wondering if you had time ta talk.=
  There's a few things I'd like ta tell ya and I don't want anyone ta hear =
me except for you."

She sighs.

" Don't worry, it's nothing bad.  It's som=
ething I forgot ta tell ya before we went our separate ways."

Perpetually =
on the move and constantly busy.

is chin thoughtfully with a crooked index finger for a

 said. "But be careful, the Predacons cannot not be
> > fully trusted to li=
ve to their side of the bargain."

 friendship while in the field,

l thinking on her part or was

roubled look on his face
> > since this was not something that could be eas=
ily taken care of on the
